vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Σαλαθιήλ, ὁ
indecl. (Heb. שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל),
Salathiel: Mat.1:12, Luk.3:27.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.27;
son of: Neri (G3518);
father of: Zerubbabel (G2216)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒拉鐵 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "我曾求告耶和華"
尼利的兒子,耶穌基督的家譜
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
撒拉铁 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "我曾求告耶和华"
尼利的儿子,耶稣基督的家谱
vocabinfos._vi_Definition: Sa-la-thi-ên «Tôi đã hỏi Đức Chúa Trời » H7597

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.3.17;
son of: Jehoiachin (H3078);
brother of: Zedekiah (H6667I)(?); father(?) of Malchiram (H4443), Pedaiah (H6305H), Shenazzar (H8137), Jekamiah (H3359H), Hoshama (H1953) and Nedabiah (H5072)
